title: AIIMS Bilaspur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 58 Senior Resident Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bilaspur (AIIMS Bilaspur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 58 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB, M.Pharm, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Bilaspur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-i...
